programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Sharon Garner and her son Shaun help recently married truck driver Martin and charity shop volunteer Geoff find a holiday home in Almeria for their budget of 80,000 euros. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Handyman Jon Wicheard hosts the third dinner party in Bath. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Cafe worker Becky Tyler hosts the fourth dinner-party challenge from Bath. The theme is a 'Mad Hat' tea party, and she sets out to put on a menu of British classics, but the round of sandwiches for starters might prove too much for the diners

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Patriotic Frenchman Denis Verrier hosts the final dinner party in Bath, and hopes his experience of working in the hospitality industry will stand him in good stead. Managing director Guy visits an 18th-century chateau in the Loire Valley with its own 18-hole golf course that is available to rent for 30,000 a night. programme.title: Police Interceptors

In Wigan, letting agents Karen O'Connor and Gemma Painter from Lobster Lettings discover a house trashed and abandoned.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: An 80mph pursuit carries on for 15 miles across North Yorkshire, while wet roads make a 90mph chase near Scarborough even more dangerous. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Twenty-five miles north of York, Julian is called to the scene of a crash in which a car careered off the road and hit a tree, with the driver pronounced dead at the scene. Elsewhere, officers disturb two suspects they believe have been carrying out break-ins leading to a 100mph chase across a golf course

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ross and John put their armed-response training to the test when they tackle a suspected gunman, while teams are called out to deal with the results of dangerous driving after a person parks on a roundabout and a pedestrian is crushed under a car. Elsewhere, officers raid a cannabis farm, a Reliant Robin is bid a fiery farewell, and Phil finds out what happens when the driver of a Subaru Impreza decides to take on an HGV

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Duggie and Mark show that they are as quick on their feet as they are behind the wheel when a serial offender tries to give them the runaround. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Angus and Sean resort to smashing down a door in a desperate attempt to save a man's life, and Kev and Colin spot a car being driven in the wrong direction down a motorway. programme.title: Dogs Behaving (Very) Badly

Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green believe the fatal stabbing of psychologist Tracy Conley may be linked to confidential client information on her computer. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

However, the case is thrown into confusion when a post-mortem reveals she may actually have died of an allergic reaction. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team races to find a sniper who is targeting marine recruitment officers and picking them off one by one. The only clue is a white feather left at the scene of each shooting - and in the absence of any other evidence, Gibbs uses himself as bait to catch the killer. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sasha Alexander and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Three similar execution-style killings take place, and the team discovers one of the victims was going through a messy divorce. Starring Michael Weatherly and David McCallum

They discover he had a seat booked next to senator Victor Caldera's daughter-in-law Angela on a flight to Miami and her fingerprints are found all over Ryan's car. Could the pair have been on a lovers' trip to the city? The detectives also discover a rival operator may have let slip knowledge of the affair to the politician. Starring Jeff Goldblum and Saffron Burrows

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series focuses on Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Goodnight Sweetheart
programme.desc: Yvonne throws Gary out, while Phoebe grows suspicious. Ron has a new girlfriend, but worries she is out of his league

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Munroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Sheltering from a blizzard in a cave, Monkey tries to trick Pigsy into sacrificing himself to save Tripitaka's life. Cult adventure, starring Masoaki Sakai and Toshiyuki Nishida

programme.title: The Cup (2011)
programme.desc: Australian jockey Damien Oliver prepares to follow in his father's footsteps and compete in the 2002 Melbourne Cup. However, the weeks leading up to the event are rocked by tragedy for both Oliver himself, who faces a death in the family, and for the nation in the wake of the Bali bombings. Fact-based drama, starring Stephen Curry and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Tiger in the Smoke (1956)
programme.desc: A criminal gang made up of war veterans is forced by a murderous escaped convict to go in search of hidden treasure. Crime thriller, starring Donald Sinden and Muriel Pavlow

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: A new planet is sighted, and after holding a seance one of the Moonbase crew becomes convinced it is habitable and tries to force Commander Koenig to evacuate all Alphans to live there. Sci-fi adventure, with Martin Landau

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: Aging in the Wild
programme.desc: Documentary revealing what it is like for animals to grow old, looking at longevity, reproductive health, social status, wisdom and eventual death, as well as examining the unique challenges every species face in the ageing process

programme.title: The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin
programme.desc: Reggie's luck is running out as he is forced to return to the pig farm, but Elizabeth's fortunes are on the up. Comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: Documentary following a group of West Ham FC fans who have formed friendships by wearing colourful shirts when they support their team in the stands

programme.title: The Alan Clark Diaries
programme.desc: Mired in a hopeless affair with his mistress, Alan's marriage to Jane suffers and eventually begins to disintegrate. Convinced his career is going the same way, he resigns just before the 1992 general election, but struggles to cope with life in the political wilderness. John Hurt and Jenny Agutter star. Part of The Thatcher Years strand

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring Bankside and East Dulwich for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: The Informers (1963)
programme.desc: The murder of a Scotland Yard informer starts a trail of deceit and intrigue among London's underworld, prompting a police inspector to conduct his own unorthodox investigation. Thriller, starring Nigel Patrick, Margaret Whiting, Colin Blakely and Derren Nesbitt

programme.title: Jeffrey (1995)
programme.desc: A gay man living in New York at the height of the Aids epidemic becomes celibate out of fear of catching the disease. When he falls for a man who is HIV positive, he is forced to confront his fears concerning both love and mortality. Comedy drama, starring Steven Weber, Patrick Stewart and Sigourney Weaver

programme.title: The Alan Clark Diaries
programme.desc: Mired in a hopeless affair with his mistress, Alan's marriage to Jane suffers and eventually begins to disintegrate. programme.desc: An alcoholic loner is snapped out of his misery when his faithful dog is murdered by a local gangster. programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: Steed heads north to investigate a mysterious laird, who he believes is responsible for fish disappearing from the Scottish coast - and maybe the dead diver found stretched on a rack. Patrick Macnee stars

programme.title: Goodnight Sweetheart
programme.desc: Gary is shocked to learn both his wives are planning to move to California. Comedy, starring Nicholas Lyndhurst, Emma Amos and Elizabeth Carling

programme.title: The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin
programme.desc: Reggie's luck is running out as he is forced to return to the pig farm, but Elizabeth's fortunes are on the up. Comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: Frieda (1947)
programme.desc: An RAF officer returns home after the Second World War, having broken out of a prisoner of war camp. He brings with him his new wife - a German woman who helped him escape. However, family and friends struggle to accept the marriage - especially when her brother comes to visit. Drama based on Ronald Millar's stage play, starring Mai Zetterling and David Farrar

programme.title: The Passing of the Third Floor Back (1935)
programme.desc: A mysterious Christ-like stranger arrives at a boarding house in London, and changes the residents' lives forever. Drama, starring Conrad Veidt, Rene Ray, Anna Lee and Frank Cellier

programme.title: The Lion Queen
programme.desc: New arrivals put added pressure on limited resources as two rescued lions arrive at Glen Garriff. A male, called TJ, is unwell and requires the vet, while a cub is mauled by one of the lions

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Light on Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough embarks on a search for the lights of nature, on a journey that will lead to ocean depths, claustrophobic caves and forests by night

programme.title: Emmeline Pankhurst: The Making of a Militant
programme.desc: Profile of Emmeline Pankhurst, who led an army of women onto the streets of Britain as leader of the suffragettes. Actress Sally Lindsay takes a look at the personal loves, losses and political passions that transformed this working mother from Manchester into a militant activist campaigning for votes for women

programme.title: When Missing Turns to Murder
programme.desc: The story of Helen McCourt, whose family's lives forever changed when her missing persons case turned into a murder investigation. Her body was never found

programme.title: Dracula (1974)
programme.desc: The vampire count comes to Victorian London in pursuit of a woman who is the exact double of his long dead wife. Horror, starring Jack Palance and Simon Ward

programme.title: Jack & Sarah (1995)
programme.desc: A lawyer's life is turned upside down by his wife's death in childbirth, leaving him to pick up the pieces and raise their daughter with the help of an unconventional American nanny. This emotional romantic comedy strikes a fair balance between sentiment and slush. Richard E Grant, Samantha Mathis, Judi Dench and Ian McKellen are among the experienced cast

programme.title: Her Private Hell (1968)
programme.desc: An Italian woman comes to London to seek her fortune, but is seduced into a seedy world of nude modelling. Drama, starring Lucia Modugno and Terence Skelton

programme.title: Realm of the Damned (2017)
programme.desc: A lone hero must survive in a world overrun by the supernatural forces of darkness. Animated horror, featuring the voice of David Vincent, Dani Filth and Jill Janus

programme.desc: How the German leader managed to escape assassination several times thanks to his handpicked bodyguards. Alpine isolation proved a tempting target for many of Hitler's enemies, including the SAS

programme.title: Hitler's Bodyguard
programme.desc: How the Stauffenberg bomb missed Hitler by inches. Documentary investigating how the German leader managed to escape assassination several times thanks to his handpicked bodyguards

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton crosses the Sea of the Hebrides to explore the Shiants, once owned by Compton Mackenzie, the author of Whisky Galore. He then heads east to the romantic Isle of Ewe, before taking a kayak trip to the Summer Isles, where he samples a seaweed feast, and on to the cliffs of Handa

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton visits Islay, travelling from Finlaggan - where the famous ruler Somerled once held court - along the windswept coast, through its historic ports and villages to end on its highest mountain. Along the way he joins dedicated locals keeping the seafaring traditions of the island alive, discovers the secrets of Islay's illicit whisky distilling past and climbs Ben Vicar for a breathtaking view across the Hebrides

programme.desc: Sheltering from a blizzard in a cave, Monkey tries to trick Pigsy into sacrificing himself to save Tripitaka's life. Cult adventure, starring Masoaki Sakai and Toshiyuki Nishida

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: A new planet is sighted, and after holding a seance one of the Moonbase crew becomes convinced it is habitable and tries to force Commander Koenig to evacuate all Alphans to live there. Sci-fi adventure, with Martin Landau

programme.title: Sabotage (1936)
programme.desc: An undercover detective poses as a grocer to get closer to a suspected terrorist thought to be plotting to blow up London. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller based on Joseph Conrad's The Secret Agent, starring Oscar Homolka, Sylvia Sidney, John Loder, Desmond Tester and Joyce Barbour

programme.title: The Trap (1966)
programme.desc: A woman is sold to a trapper in 19th-century British Columbia and reluctantly becomes his wife, overcoming her initial fears to nurse him through an illness. Drama, starring Oliver Reed, Rita Tushingham and Rex Sevenoaks

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: Steed heads north to investigate a mysterious laird, who he believes is responsible for fish disappearing from the Scottish coast - and maybe the dead diver found stretched on a rack. Patrick Macnee stars

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: Ainsley's Gourmet Express
programme.desc: The exuberant chef gives brunch a new twist, serving up an extra-special BLT sandwich, hot Bloody Mary soup, mushrooms stuffed with soft garlic cheese, pesto-rippled scrambled eggs and ricotta pancakes with mulled strawberries. He also gets the chance to sample the unusual and creative all-day brunch at Denial in Birmingham, which includes sausages with pan-fried grapes

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Italy Made With Love
programme.desc: Umbria, the green heart of Italy, is the land that time and tourism forgot. Shaped by geography and politics, the region became a thriving model of creative self-sufficiency

programme.title: An Englishman in New York
programme.desc: John Hurt reprises his role as Quentin Crisp in this sequel to The Naked Civil Servant, picking up his story where the 1975 drama about the eccentric Englishman left off. Crisp sets off on the journey of a lifetime to the Big Apple, where the Americans immediately embrace the openly gay writer and his waspish ways, and before long he is being wined and dined by celebrities in every corner of Manhattan. But, as is so often the case with Quentin, he cannot resist making outrageous comments, and an ill-considered quip about the growing Aids crisis sees him suddenly dropped from high society. Sex and the City's Cynthia Nixon co-stars as performance artist Penny Arcade, with Jonathan Tucker, Denis O'Hare and Swoosie Kurtz

programme.title: The Informers (1963)
programme.desc: The murder of a Scotland Yard informer starts a trail of deceit and intrigue among London's underworld, prompting a police inspector to conduct his own unorthodox investigation. Thriller, starring Nigel Patrick, Margaret Whiting, Colin Blakely and Derren Nesbitt

programme.title: Everything Must Go (2010)
programme.desc: A man's heavy drinking costs him his job and leads to his wife kicking him out of the house. He sets up home on their lawn, amid all the possessions she has thrown out, and to avoid seeming homeless, he begins selling them, leading him to make new friendships with his neighbours and gradually straighten out his life. Comedy drama, starring Will Ferrell and Laura Dern

programme.title: Blackonomics
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the UK's Afro-Caribbean community's relationship with money when it comes to education, investing and building general wealth

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay.

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days.

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: 'Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital.

programme.title: Strike It Lucky
programme.desc: Michael Barrymore hosts the madcap game show, in which three teams of two prove seek to progress along a board game-style path by answering questions. Each duo are allowed to determine how many spaces they would like to move by answering the corresponding number of questions. Landing on a space reveals it's hidden contents, which could amount to a prize, or a 'hot spot', which causes contestants to forfeit their gathered winnings
